page.title: 076SU RUDLOE MANOR, CORSHAM
page.content: 6SU is just part of RAF Rudloe Manor's defence force. It moved to Rudloe in 1977 and is at present used as a communication post sending coded messages to other bases across Britain. It is made up of underground tunnels so that it will recieve maximum protection in time of war. There are 8 working levels and a recreation level. My dad was posted to 6SU in 1983. He is a day worker which means he works from 8.30am - 5.00pm. There are also shift workers at 6SU and they could work either from 7.30am.-7.30pm. Or from 7.30pm.-7.30am . 3 other members of my tutor group have fathers in the RAF at 6SU, but they are all shift workers. In 1984 CND protesters broke into 6SU because they objected to the tunnels being used to start wars.
